text: chaur anak atthmot khluoneng cheamuoynung b na d anak del korp sakkar champoh mcheasa robsa puokke teangoprukteangolngeach daoy puokke chng ban kar ylprom pi trong . haey chaur anak kom meul romlng puokke daoy anak chngban pheap aschary nei karorsanow knong lokey . haey chaur anak kom korp tam anak del yeung ban thveu aoy chetd robsa ke min yk chetd touk dak knong kar romluk mk champoh yeung ning ban thveuteam te ampeu chetd robsa ke aoy saoh . haey kechchakar robsa ke klaytowchea a nd reay towvinh
